text: Takheun di lon nyoe meulon seumeugah Lon manusia sit lagee gata Teuma Neuyue ba wahyu le Allah Keu bandum gata Neuwahyu bak lon Tuhan gata dum cit sidroe Allah Teuma beu teutap keuh ate gata Bek na meutuka iman meuubah Talakee ampon ubak Droeneuh nyan Ceulaka yohnyan keu awak salah Jipeucharikat Tuhan ngon laen
